info.name: API
info.description:
# Give My Secret Postman Collection

The goal of this collection is to provide ready-to-go samples to connect with Give My Secret credential storage application.

You can find useful samples for all APIs:

- API keys
- Keystores
- Secrets
- API query
- User management
- Events
- Announcements
- Authentication
